items.sentence: Tom told me Mary has been living in Boston for three years.
Both of the songs that we sang tonight were written by Tom.
There was some chewing gum stuck to the sole of Tom's shoe.
My father got to his company later than usual this morning.
This publishing house specializes in children's literature.
Where would you prefer to sit, in the front or in the back?
I can't say for sure how many times I've been to Australia.
Tom played several square dance tunes on his fiddle for us.
I grabbed my little sister by the hand and started running.
I can't remember the last time I sewed a button on a shirt.
